title: [Large-Scale] Language Learning Process Design Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic AI concepts and foundational language learning competencies
context.additional_context: Enhanced language learning activities using smartphone-based AI tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more language learning strategies using generative AI tools (translators, paraphrasing tools, chatbots)
Learners can demonstrate the process of generating learning content by applying ethical usage principles of AI tools
Learners can design AI-human collaborative learning models and suggest improvements through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
